body: @nuss-justin Now I see why `string(byteSlice) == str` became 3 times faster in Go 1.5 according to http://stackoverflow.com/a/31484416/2898400 . But it still 8 times slower than calling `bytes.Equal` via an unsafe cast. And this is in an ideal case when whole 100 byte long slice has to be read for the answer. So escape analyzes helps, but not that match as bytes still has to be copied.
